name: A Canine Consultation
description:
CONTENT WARNING:

This game contains content that may not be suitable for all audiences, including plot elements involving domestic abuse, alcohol, and violence. Viewer discretion is advised.

This short Visual Novel was made by Sun Paladin (me!) for the NaNoRenO 2023 Online Game Jam.

The intention behind the creation of this game was to familiarize myself with the syntax and language knowledge required for coding a novel with Ren'Py.

This does not represent a 'demo' version of a final product, as it is intended to stand on its own.

Additionally, this game is my first fully-completed project using the Ren'Py engine. I am happy with the final product, but it may have bugs that I failed to catch during the testing phase.

If this is the case, please feel free to leave a comment on this page, where I will do my best to respond and fix it in a future update (even if said update is released past the game jam's deadline.

With that being said, please enjoy my short story that follows a late-night conversation between a bartender and a guest, who recently became a werewolf.

I hope you enjoy A Canine Consultation!

Credits:

Rain sounds. The sound of summer rain - DMD Production,

Diamond Slot - Nodgez,

Main Door Opening-Closing - FocusBay
